text: No Smoking is a cartoon made by Walt Disney Productions in 1951, featuring Goofy. ==Voice cast== * Goofy: Pinto Colvig ==Home media== The short was released on December 2, 2002 on Walt Disney Treasures: The Complete Goofy, with its original ending. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:Short movies Category:Goofy Category:1950s English-language movies
title: No Smoking (1951 movie)
